name: Great War 1914
description: You play as a French soldier on the front line. The Germans really want to throw your battalion back and brutally attack your positions every day. One quiet night, the protagonist sensed something amiss...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8.1, 10 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo (or equivalent) Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: with 512 MB VRAM compatible with DirectX DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 120 MB available space Sound Card: DirectXÂ® Compatible
